document.forum_title: Latest Europe News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: The hidden costs of drinking bottled water
document.topic_text: The hidden costs of drinking bottled water Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 3 hours ago ) Bottled water sales are growing at a much faster rate than soft drinks. This might be better for your health, but it is terrible for the environment – and your pocket
document.post: The hidden costs of drinking bottled water Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 3 hours ago ) Bottled water sales are growing at a much faster rate than soft drinks. This might be better for your health, but it is terrible for the environment – and your pocket
